title: I need literally 2 blue champion essence to get lvl 6 yasuo Im a yasuo main and Im soooooooo close
body: Im begging you last time I was low 'bout 60 rp low on something, then I changed my mind. And you said I could do something to earn it... yes please riot I'll do whatever you would like

replies.body:
Hey,

If you head over to the store, you'll see a "Hextech Mystery Champ Shard". You'll be able to purchase it with IP and unlock it in your Hextech Inventory.

It'll give you a champion shard that you can redeem for Blue Essence. It cost 1700 IP or 195 RP.

Go wild.
